options.content:
- Use Cases: This dashboard is to overview the Git and project management metrics.
- Data Source Required: Jira + GitHub, or Jira + GitLab.

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(*)
from
  lake.issues i
where
  i.priority in ($critical) and
  i.type = 'BUG' and
  date(i.created_date) between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY;

with _issues as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(*) as defect_count
  from
    lake.issues i
  where
    i.priority in ($critical)
    and i.type = 'BUG'
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
)

select
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  defect_count
from _issues
order by time asc

with _inprogress_times as (
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    c.created_date as inprogress_time
  from
    lake.issues i
    join lake.issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    c.field_name = 'status'
    and c.original_to_value in ($inprogress_status) 
    and date(i.created_date) between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY
),

_done_times as (
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    c.created_date as done_time
  from
    lake.issues i
    join lake.issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    c.field_name = 'status'
    and c.original_to_value in ($done_status)
    and date(i.created_date) between STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY
)

select
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, inprogress_time, done_time) / 1440)
from
  _inprogress_times it
  join _done_times dt on it.issue_id = dt.issue_id

with _inprogress_times as (
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    i.created_date,
    c.created_date as inprogress_time
  from
    lake.issues i
    join lake.issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    c.field_name = 'status'
    and c.original_to_value in ($inprogress_status) 
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
),

_done_times as (
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    i.created_date,
    c.created_date as done_time
  from
    lake.issues i
    join lake.issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    c.field_name = 'status'
    and c.original_to_value in ($done_status)
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
)

select
  DATE_ADD(date(it.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(it.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, inprogress_time, done_time) / 1440) as avg_issue_cycle_time_in_days
from
  _inprogress_times it
  join _done_times dt on it.issue_id = dt.issue_id
group by time

select
  count(distinct author_name)
from
  lake.commits c
  join lake.repo_commits rc on c.sha = rc.commit_sha
where
  date(authored_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY and
  rc.repo_id in ($repo_id);

with _developers as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(c.authored_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(c.authored_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(distinct author_name) as developer_count
  from
    lake.commits c
    join lake.repo_commits rc on c.sha = rc.commit_sha
  where
    $__timeFilter(c.authored_date)
    and c.authored_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and rc.repo_id in ($repo_id)
  group by time
)

select
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  developer_count
from _developers
order by time asc

with _num_issues_with_sprint_updated as (
  select
    count(*) as num_issues_with_sprint_updated
  from
    lake.issues i
    join lake.issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    c.field_name = 'Sprint' and
    c.original_from_value != '' and
    c.original_to_value != '' and
    date(i.created_date) between
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY
),

_total_num_issues as (
  select
    count(*) as total_num_issues
  from
    lake.issues i
  where
    date(i.created_date) between
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY
)

select
  now() as time,
  100 - 100 * (select 1.0 * num_issues_with_sprint_updated from _num_issues_with_sprint_updated) / (select total_num_issues from _total_num_issues) as ratio;

with _num_issues_with_sprint_updated as (
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(*) as num_issues_with_sprint_updated
  from
    lake.issues i
    join lake.issue_changelogs c on i.id = c.issue_id
  where
    c.field_name = 'Sprint'
    and c.original_from_value != '' 
    and c.original_to_value != ''
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
),

_total_num_issues as (
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(i.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(i.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(*) as total_num_issues
  from
    lake.issues i
  where
    $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
    and i.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
)

select
  x.time,
  100 - 100 * (1.0 * x.num_issues_with_sprint_updated / y.total_num_issues) as delivery_rate
from 
  _num_issues_with_sprint_updated x 
  join _total_num_issues y on x.time = y.time

select
  count(*)
from
  lake.pull_requests pr
where
  pr.merged_date is not null 
  and date(pr.merged_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d')
    and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY 
  and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id);

with _merged_prs as(
  select
    DATE_ADD(date(pr.merged_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(pr.merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    count(*) as pr_merged_count
  from
    lake.pull_requests pr
  where
    pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
    and pr.merged_date is not null
    and $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    and pr.merged_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by time
)

select
  date_format(time,'%M %Y') as month,
  pr_merged_count
from _merged_prs
order by time asc

select 
  100*sum(case when id in (select pull_request_id from pull_request_issues) then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) as unlinked_pr_rate
from lake.pull_requests 
where base_repo_id in ($repo_id)

-- with _prs as(
select
  DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  100*sum(case when id in (select pull_request_id from pull_request_issues) then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) as unlinked_pr_rate
from lake.pull_requests 
where base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
group by time

with _commits_groupby_name_and_date as (
  select
    author_name,
    date(authored_date) as _day,
    count(*)
  from
    lake.commits
  where
    WEEKDAY(authored_date) between 0 and 4 and
    date(authored_date) between
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
      STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY
  group by
  author_name, date(authored_date)
)

select 100 * count(*) / (count(distinct author_name) * count(distinct _day))
from _commits_groupby_name_and_date;

with _commits_groupby_name_and_date as (
  select
    author_name,
    date(authored_date) as _day,
    count(*)
  from
    lake.commits
  where
    (WEEKDAY(authored_date) between 0 and 4)
    and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and authored_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
  group by 1,2
)

select
  DATE_ADD(_day, INTERVAL -DAY(_day)+1 DAY) as time,
  100*count(*)/(count(distinct author_name) * count(distinct _day)) as working_days_percentatages_per_month
from _commits_groupby_name_and_date
group by time

panels.title: Percentage of Coding Days Each Month

targets.rawSql:
select
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date) / 1440)
from
  lake.pull_requests pr
where
  pr.merged_date is not null
  and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
  and date(pr.created_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') 
    and STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY

select
  DATE_ADD(date(pr.created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(pr.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, pr.created_date, pr.merged_date) / 1440) as pr_cycle_time_in_days
from
  lake.pull_requests pr
where
  pr.merged_date is not null
  and pr.base_repo_id in ($repo_id)
  and $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  and pr.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
group by time
order by time

select
  i.priority as 'Priority',
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.created_date, NOW()) / 1440) as 'Average Age'
from
  lake.issues i
where
  i.status = 'TODO'
  and i.type = 'BUG'
  and i.priority in ($critical)
group by
  i.priority

panels.title: Average Age of Critical Outstanding Defects by Priority

targets.rawSql:
select
  sum(case when type = 'BUG' then 1 else 0 end) as 'Bug',
  sum(case when type = 'BUG' and epic_key != '' then 1 else 0 end) as 'Strategic',
  sum(case when type != 'BUG' and epic_key = '' then 1 else 0 end) as 'Non-Strategic'
from
  issues
where
  resolution_date is not null and
  date(resolution_date) between
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') and
    STR_TO_DATE('$month','%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 MONTH - INTERVAL 1 DAY

options.content: This dashboard is created based on this [data schema](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/DataModels/DevLakeDomainLayerSchema). Want to add more metrics? Please follow the [guide](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/UserManuals/Dashboards/GrafanaUserGuide).

list.definition: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from repos
list.label: Repo
list.name: repo_id
list.query: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from repos

list.definition:
select
  distinct(concat(date_format(DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY), '%Y-%m') , ':', date_format(DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'))) as month
from
  lake.issues i
order by month desc
list.label: Month
list.name: month
list.query:
select
  distinct(concat(date_format(DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY), '%Y-%m') , ':', date_format(DATE_ADD(date(created_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(created_date))+1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'))) as month
from
  lake.issues i
order by month desc

list.definition: select original_to_value from issue_changelogs where field_name = 'status'
list.description: Customize status(es) that are considered as "In-Progress"
list.label: Status(es) of In-progress Issues
list.name: inprogress_status
list.query: select original_to_value from issue_changelogs where field_name = 'status'

list.definition: select original_to_value from issue_changelogs where field_name = 'status'
list.description: Customize status(es) that are considered as "Done"
list.label: Status(es) of Done Issues
list.name: done_status
list.query: select original_to_value from issue_changelogs where field_name = 'status'
